content.raw:
I create [pull request](https://github.com/dartsim/dart/pull/228) to use default margin instead of zero.

I figured out why DART fails SpawnDropCoGOffset. DART corrects position constraint error (e.g., penetration) by generating error correction velocity and it is controlled by ERP. If ERP is zero then error correction velocity is zero, and if ERP is 1.0 then error correction velocity is (error_correction_velocity = error / time_step). The problem is DART cannot pass with any ERP. If ERP is zero then the position test fails, and if ERP is non-zero then the velocity test fails.

DART needs split error correction method to pass all the tests perfectly.
content.html:
I create pull request to use default margin instead of zero.

I figured out why DART fails SpawnDropCoGOffset. DART corrects position constraint error (e.g., penetration) by generating error correction velocity and it is controlled by ERP. If ERP is zero then error correction velocity is zero, and if ERP is 1.0 then error correction velocity is (error_correction_velocity = error / time_step). The problem is DART cannot pass with any ERP. If ERP is zero then the position test fails, and if ERP is non-zero then the velocity test fails.

DART needs split error correction method to pass all the tests perfectly.
